      • getEnergyHolderSupport

        @Nullable
public static <I> IEnergySupport<I> getEnergyHolderSupport(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity te,
                                                                      net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from)
        Get the correct energy holder support from the TileEntity
        Type Parameters:
        I - The interface which represents this support
        Parameters:
        te - The TileEntity which holds energy
        from - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        Returns:
        The IEnergySupport for the TileEntity if it has support. Can be null

                                 long energy)

        to - The unit the energy wants to be in

      • getEnergyStored

        public static long getEnergyStored(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity te,
                                   net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from)
        Get the energy stored from the given TileEntity
        Parameters:
        te - The TileEntity which holds the energy
        from - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        Returns:
        The amount of energy stored in the TileEntity in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES

      • giveEnergy

        public static long giveEnergy(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity te,
                              long energy,
                              boolean simulate,
                              net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from)
        Give energy to the given TileEntity
        Parameters:
        te - The TileEntity which will receive energy
        energy - The energy to be given in the EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES unit
        simulate - Whether or not it is a simulation. If so, no energy is actually given
        from - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        Returns:
        The amount of energy which was given (or would have been given if it is simulated) in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES

      • giveEnergy

        public static long giveEnergy(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                              long energy,
                              boolean simulate,
                              net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from)
        Give energy to the given ItemStack
        Parameters:
        stack - The ItemStack which will receive energy
        energy - The energy to be given in the EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES unit
        simulate - Whether or not it is a simulation. If so, no energy is actually given
        from - The side of the ItemStack for use with Capability
        Returns:
        The amount of energy which was given (or would have been given if it is simulated) in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES

      • takeEnergy

        public static long takeEnergy(net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity te,
                              long energy,
                              boolean simulate,
                              net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing from)
        Take energy from the given TileEntity
        Parameters:
        te - The TileEntity which will have extracted from
        energy - The energy to be taken in the EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES unit
        simulate - Whether or not it is a simulation. If so, no energy is actually taken
        from - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        Returns:
        The amount of energy which was taken (or would have been taken if it is simulated) in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES

      • takeEnergyAllFaces

        public static long takeEnergyAllFaces(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                      net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                      long energy,
                                      boolean simulate)
        Takes energy from all connecting energy handlers surrounding the target block
        Parameters:
        world - The world to get the TileEntity from
        pos - The center position
        energy - The energy to take altogether. Will be distributed evenly between the TileEntitys. Needs to be in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES
        simulate - Whether it is a simulation or not. If so, the energy won't actually be taken
        Returns:
        The amount of energy taken in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES

      • giveEnergyAllFaces

        public static long giveEnergyAllFaces(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                      net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                      long energy,
                                      boolean simulate)
        Gives energy to all connecting energy handlers surrounding the target block
        Parameters:
        world - The world to get the TileEntity from
        pos - The center position
        energy - The energy to give altogether. Will be distributed evenly between the TileEntitys. Needs to be in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES
        simulate - Whether it is a simulation or not. If so, the energy won't actually be given
        Returns:
        The amount of energy given in the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit EnergyUnits.MINECRAFT_JOULES

      • addCachedEnergyData

        public static void addCachedEnergyData(java.lang.String modid,
                                       java.lang.String className,
                                       EnergyData data)
        Saves data when syncing with the server
        Parameters:
        modid - The modid so each mod has its own cache of data
        className - The name of the class so each class can only sync one data
        data - The data to sync

      • getCachedEnergyData

        public static EnergyData getCachedEnergyData(java.lang.String modid)
        Retrieves the latest data from the calling class
        Parameters:
        modid - The modid to get mod specific data
        Returns:
        The latest data from the calling class

      • getCachedEnergyData

        public static EnergyData getCachedEnergyData(java.lang.String modid,
                                             java.lang.String className)
        Retrieves the latest data from the given class
        Parameters:
        modid - The modid to get mod specific data
        className - The name of the class which the data was requested from
        Returns:
        The latest data from the given class

      • syncEnergy

        public static void syncEnergy(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                              net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side,
                              java.lang.String modid)
        Sync energy with the server. To get the data use getCachedEnergyData(String) or getCachedEnergyData(String, String) and then use EnergyData.getEnergy(). This will store the data in the calling class in the cache
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        modid - The modid for mod specific data

      • syncEnergy

        public static void syncEnergy(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                              net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side,
                              java.lang.String modid,
                              java.lang.String className)
        Sync energy with the server. To get the data use getCachedEnergyData(String) or getCachedEnergyData(String, String) and then use EnergyData.getEnergy(). This will store the data in the class path provided in the cache
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        modid - The modid for mod specific data
        className - The name of the class for the cache

      • syncCapacity

                                java.lang.String modid)

        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        modid - The modid for mod specific data

      • syncEnergyField

        public static void syncEnergyField(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                   net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side,
                                   java.lang.String energyFieldName)
        Sync energy using a Field in the calling class. This will set the fields value to the energy of the TileEntity at the given BlockPos
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        energyFieldName - The name of the field which will hold the energy. Must be a long

      • syncEnergyField

        public static void syncEnergyField(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                   net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side,
                                   java.lang.String className,
                                   java.lang.String energyFieldName)
        Sync energy using a Field in the class provided. This will set the fields value to the energy of the TileEntity at the given BlockPos
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        className - The name of the class which holds the field
        energyFieldName - The name of the field which will hold the energy. Must be a long

      • syncCapacityField

        public static void syncCapacityField(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                     net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side,
                                     java.lang.String capacityFieldName)
        Sync capacity using a Field in the calling class. This will set the fields value to the capacity of the TileEntity at the given BlockPos
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        capacityFieldName - The name of the field which will hold the capacity. Must be a long

                                     java.lang.String capacityFieldName)

      • syncEnergyDataFields

        public static void syncEnergyDataFields(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos,
                                        net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing side,
                                        java.lang.String energyFieldName,
                                        java.lang.String capacityFieldName)
        Sync energy and capacity using Fields in the calling class. This will set the fields values to the energy and capacity (each respectively) of the TileEntity at the given BlockPos
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
        energyFieldName - The name of the field which will hold the energy. Must be a long
        capacityFieldName - The name of the field which will hold the capacity. Must be a long

                                        java.lang.String capacityFieldName)

        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the TileEntity
        side - The side of the TileEntity for use with Capability
